entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.5°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
